page.title: 11GEORGE NOBBS-PUBLISHER
page.content: { George Nobbs has lived in Norwich all his life.He likes most things about Norwich,especially the streets,trees, houses and roundabouts. He says Norwich has changed a lot in his life time.In the early 1960s many buildings were destroyed, and streets completely cleared. Since ten years ago theres not been much change except for the good. More trees have been planted around office blocks.Theres nothing really he'd like changed now.The first book he wrote was protesting about the destroying of buildings. He does not like the fact that schools and museums have all been handed over to the Norfolk County Council. He thinks that the shopping facilities are marvellous considering the size of Norwich.George has published 30-40 books on Norwich and Norfolk.
